wind.title: Wind Message
wind.defaultMessage:
No wind messages have arrived yet.

When one does, a butterfly will flutter by your mailbox to let you know.

Sending a message to someone can also become a quiet and beautiful gift.

Try releasing one gently from the ‚úâÔ∏è message app, and let it ride the wind.

about.title: OS Yamato - ver.0
about.conceptText: OS Yamato is a new kind of OS that embraces the idea: "If a record is not touched, it returns to the wind." It avoids hoarding data, and stays quiet and gentle.
about.feature.calendar: Calendar: Use templates to stay organized
about.feature.memo: Memos, Contacts, and Wind Messages: Keep only what you need, lightly
about.feature.photo: Photos: Organize them and let them return to the wind
terms.title: Terms of Use and Privacy Policy
terms.body:
OS Yamato is founded on the philosophy that "a record, if left untouched, returns to the wind."

All data is temporarily stored in the cloud, but it will be automatically deleted if not accessed for a certain period (currently, 365 days without viewing). This retention period may be changed without prior notice.

Your records will bloom, ride the wind, and eventually fade away.
We invite you to enjoy their impermanence‚Äîfreely and peacefully.

‚ñ† Important Notes for Use
„ÉªThis service does not guarantee the permanent preservation of your data.
„ÉªData exceeding the retention period will be automatically deleted and cannot be recovered.
„ÉªWe are not responsible for any data loss caused by access issues, communication errors, or user mistakes.
„ÉªPlease back up important records yourself if necessary.
„ÉªPersonal information is used solely for authentication and service delivery, and will not be shared with third parties (except as required by law).

To use this service, you must review and agree to the terms above.
These terms may be updated in the future due to service improvements or legal requirements.
The latest version of the terms can always be viewed in the Settings screen.

This service is provided by an individual developer. For inquiries, please contact us via the "Contact" section in the Settings screen.
